channel.title: Active Hurricanes, Cyclones and Typhoons - ArcGIS Living Atlas of the World, Esri
channel.description: This layer describes the observed path, forecast track, and intensity of tropical cyclone activity (hurricanes, typhoons, cyclones) from the National Hurricane Center (NHC) and Joint Typhoon Warning Center (JTWC).

item.title: Active Hurricanes, Cyclones and Typhoons - ArcGIS Living Atlas of the World, Esri
